name: BookClub Web
description: BookClub Web is an online platform that connects book lovers across the globe. Participate in book discussions, join book clubs tailored to your interests, and discover your next great read.
features: Variety of book clubs and reading groups
Reading progress tracker and book lists

highlightedReview.author: Jane Doe
highlightedReview.comment: I've found so many amazing books through BookClub Web and have met some incredible reading buddies! The discussion forums are really engaging.
